ygData.subject: Smithing inprovement
ygData.msgSnippet: As par what information i found in different places i started with metal bits (about 1/2p worth advanced me a point) till skill 21 i think. (i never trained as
ygData.messageBody:
As par what information i found in different places i started with metal bits
(about 1/2p worth advanced me a point) till skill 21 i think. (i never trained as i
am saving training points [do not ask me why i don't know]) then i started on files
and studs and made 1 point after spending over 4p decided that was not even close to
worth it and found Scaler molds and started with them they advanced my skill at
about 1p each cause the finished molds you can sell back at a minimal profit
(actually a loss i think because of the cost of pisces of ore) i stopped doing this
at skill 41 and was happy with my results (only problem i had was the confusing
molds were visually identical so i wasted a few in my long trek from 22 to 41) now
i am making skewers and am loosing about 2p per point. if this is the way it goes
oh well.. if not i would like a suggestion to what i should make my skill is 44
intelligence is 70 and charisma of 115. i see a pattern here as skill points cost double what
they did before. but i am ok with it as i hunt wisps for cash then purchase my
stuff to make. is anything besides skewers going to raise my skill for less? i
dislike that i fail 90 plus percent of the time and never am able to sell the
skewers back.

hope this helps others with there smithing and i would like feedback on if anything
will advance me faster for less

Anakri
Mithanial Marr
